author: {'steamid': '76561198259538261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1559057736}
review:
I literaly can't even play it thanks EA, the CD key is completly broken I don't remember C&C 3 asking me for anything 
The story revealed something in the most garbage way ever, I only know this cuz I watched the campaign on youtube to even know what I would get into, 
Firstly the tiberium is gone, it's just gone, no longer plot relevant I guess even tho from 1-3 it was literaly the thing that made this game interesting and it's the entire plot point of all 3 of these but no just remove it. 
Than we got something we never asked for, where is the base building asset gone to, WASN'T THAT LIKE WHAT WE LIKED ABOUT IT EH? BUILDING A BASE? EXPANDING? No give us this armored walkers that work as an entire base, no tech to research, no tech, no make us level up to unlock new units, instead of building a high tech building to unlock the top tier shit, get to level 30 or something and the combined arms aspect? nah we don't need that shit, heres offense, defense, support because you have been used to using your firehawks to bomb the living hell out of NOD while charging in with your zone troopers an mammoth tanks, no heres only one for you, your either infantry and defenses, aircraft only or heavy vehicles cuz fuck you
Next up we have this being an online game, AI? goodbye, online only, no fun trying to work your ass of trying to be brutal AI for that dam platinum cuz that shit wasn't fun nooo we all just hated it you know?
Also now you just have unlimited money because we can longer mine tiberium which was very important having to expand your area to get other tib fields so you can get more money so you can get more units, just give us a unit cap because yes
No more trying to get that giant tiberium field, no more aquring that blue tiberium, no more getting those silos, no more getting those towers.
Defense is literaly the most useless MCV ever, next being support and offense being the only one you should ever pick
Also we added the scrin into the storyline even tho they never appear in the game despite it being clear that the first apearence was just an Expeditionary force, we couldev gave them a second comming with literaly more firepower than ever but nah man just add some random scrin guy or whatever his name was I don't remember the story it's boring
Also good way to kill the whole mystery of Kane being literally immortal by telling us, hey this dude ain't human his an alien. Way to kill the mood

author: {'steamid': '76561198260571913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1521960192}
review:
经过了11年，这游戏终于下架了。

本身质量什么的就不提了，这游戏临下架前是个什么状态呢？服务器经常出错，上EA论坛发贴询问，社区经理要么完全不知道，要么只会丢出几个屁用没有的“解决方案”。

这次下架意味着，玩家的单位解锁进度、对战记录都会烟消云散，而更为重要的是，由于单人战役也需要全程联网才能存档，即便剧情战役是烂到姥姥家去的屑作，CNC泰伯利亚系列以后再想去体验这一故事线将变得不可能以正版渠道来实现。系列正作用纯联机游戏的形式来体现，其不可靠性不言自明。

现在Steam商店页面甚至把多人联机标签撕了，那看来EA算是主动放弃售卖了。如果EA就是这种态度的话，我建议TTF的下架麻烦也搞快点。

12.02更新:TTF真下架了？那没事了。

author: {'steamid': '76561197960369519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 899, 'last_played': 1348297200}
review:
Je suis un fan de la toute première heure de C&C. ​Oui, j'ai joué au tout premier en 1995. C'était dans son temps un jeu révolutionnaire. Le FMV, la musique cultisime, l'ergonomie intuitive... les cinématiques étaient magnifiques.
​Je savais que ce dernier command and conquer n'était pas fort brillant. Mais, je me devais de le jouer, juste pour l'histoire et revoir le célèbre Kane une dernière fois...

Ça fait longtemps que j'y ai joué, mais, il est tellement présent dans ma mémoire que je me dois d'en faire un commentaire ! 

Ceci est probablement l'un.... si non, le PIRE exemple de la fausse "bonne idée" dans l'histoire du jeu video!

A la place d'une base, on a un constructeur mobile.

Le jeu se distingue par un côté pierre/papier/ciseaux prononcé. Qui peut avoir de bons côté, mais est totalement ridicule par moment. Ou des véhicules antichar avec quasi aucun blindage sont capables de résister à des obus en pleine face sans problème.

Bref, un constructeur mobile en tant qu'unique base, et on gagne en multi avec des points de capture, parce qu'on n'a pas de resources à gérer.

C'était sûrement pour rendre le jeu plus nerveux et révolutionner le RTS ???
Non ??? Je pari que c'est EA qui voulait investir le minimum possible. Pas de base, pas d'équilibrage à prévoir. Et jeu accessible à plus grand nombre (les non joueurs de RTS).

Sérieusement, pas de base à construire et à GÉRER ? Ceci est la pire idée qu'ils pouvaient avoir.
Resultat, on vadrouille dans la map à l'aveugle, pour capturer des points de contrôle et éviter si possible d'exposer son seul QG.
En plus, si l'ennemi a construit un build "contre" le votre, l'effet pierre/papier/ciseaux très prononcé fait que vous ne pouvez tout simplement pas gagner. On sélectionne toute des unités et les supprime lol. Pour construire un nouveau build. Oui, parce qu'il n'a pas de ressources, juste des points de population. Vous pouvez vous débarrasser de vos unités sans remors.

Les unités aérienne sont OP. Et le QG volant l'est tout autant. Il permet d'éviter indéfiniment les ennemis. Ce qui vous permet jouer au petit parasite toute la partie ! Yay ! Le plaisir !... (oui l'équilibrage de ce jeu est horrible)

Même si on joue la campagne, il faut grinder de l'XP pour déverrouiller des unités. Vous obligeant à rejouer des maps solo. Comme si le jeu n'était pas assez mauvais et inintéressant comme ça...

Le multi était mort dès la première semaine.

Enfin, parlons de l'histoire. Sans grand intérêt, voire stupide. Triste final...
Petit spoil :
Kane utilise le portail alien du 3eme volet pour partir définitivement. Fin, et point final à la saga. Tout ce que vous accomplissez au cours de l'histoire ne sert pas à grand chose. Vous avez servi de garde du corps à Kane et vous activez le portail.
Argggggg ! Et ils sont où les aliens ?

Graphiquement c'est... Euh... Pareil que le 3 ? En moins détaillé ???

Bref "press F" pour cette franchise, honteusement humilié et massacrée dans ce C&C 4.
Je pense sur c'est le pire jeu, de ma bibliothèque Steam........ Rien que ça....
Et c'est 20 euros! Vraiment ? A ce prix on a des alternatives bien... Bien... Bien meilleures.

Par conte, je vous conseille sans hésitation le C&C remarsterd. Aussi bien que l'original, avec les cinématiques d'optimisées pour les résolutions actuelles. Le gamplay est veuillo mais toujours excellent,  particulièrement pour un nostalgique qui y a joué à l'époque comme moi 😄
Ne prenez pas le 4, l'une des pires déception de l'histoire. Sa note steam est amplement merité.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164673540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1628420171}
review:
Худшая из стратегий которые я встречал;
Максимально тупая механика, это даже не стратегия это какой-то цыганский цирк! Ты просто кочуешь со своей базой (которая является единственным зданием в игре, окромя 2х пушек и бункеров если выберешь деф модуль). 
Приличных ресурсов нет, привычных зданий нет. Привычного и знакомого хоть чего-то нет! Это не c&c. Может кто есть такой же старый как я и помнит на PS1 стратегию Z. Вот она же только карты сильно меньше
Кампания при прохождении даёт отворот-поворот уже к 3-4 миссии. Без прокачки навыков пройти почти невозможно, а качать оные или прохождением кампании или долгими сражениями в режиме сражения.
Режим сражение особое дно. Выбрать сторону нельзя - вот ты GDI и хоть усрись. Видимо возможность играть за НОД надо открывать как-то но блть это сраный режим сражения! Везде и всегда это было  - выбрал карту, стартовые условия, соперников/союзников и поехали.
Это не тот случай где отличная задумка да плохая реализация. Это случай когда просто ущербнейшую задумку реализовали максимально близко к задуманному.
К покупке не рекомендую, даже бесплатно если давать будут - не берите. 
Оцениваю в 1 из 10 и желаю что б в дом каждого, кто причастен к разработке, наведался араб

author: {'steamid': '76561198070634215', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1625872603}
review:
Poniendo en una balanza lo bueno y lo malo, lamentablemente cobra mas peso lo MALO. 

-Como C&C es malo, como juego de estrategia también. Y digo "estrategia" por decir algo, porque es casi nula. Cada pantalla se basa en un "toma y daca" entre tú y la cpu "defecando" unidades infinitas sin parar hasta que una aplasta a la otra.

-La historia es la peor de la saga, ya no solo por el sinsentido del argumento si no por lo pésimamente malos que son todos los actores de los vídeos, ni el propio Kane se salva, es su peor papel de lejos. 2 campañas, una larga y la de NOD cortisima que parece un "pegote" puesto de relleno y ambas con el mismo final.....

-Tiene ideas que podrían haber sido medio buenas pero si se hubiese planteado de otra forma, lo único salvable es el uso del motor gráfico de Red Alert 3, que este último sin ser perfecto ni mucho menos es bastante mejor juego y más disfrutable.

+Resumiendo: Solo puede interesar a alguien que quiera terminar la saga y saber como se cierra la historia, dejandole el sabor agridulce de lo que podía haber sido y lo que nos han dado. Una lástima ver como esta gran franquicia acabó así de mal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026804287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1625820766}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042383071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 891, 'last_played': 1625169986}
review: The disappointing end to a great series. Command and Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight was a completely botched game that ultimately leaves you with a bad taste for the whole series. The campaign is short, the servers are down/dead, and the gameplay was repetitive from the earlier entries in the series. Unfortunately this game isn't really playable so that means a negative review but I hope Command and Conquer makes a return one day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198856352964', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1625092440}

author: {'steamid': '76561198352956494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1667421428}
review: I have to say this came as a nice surprise since virtually everyone is trash talking this game... But I actually loved it. I really enjoyed the balance between strategic planning and live action, I think it comes pretty smooth and natural. Besides, the graphics and sounds are really enjoyable. Much better than the previous Tiberium release, or the really disappointing Red Alert 3. One negative note though, it is quite hard to understand what type of units you are creating - or should create - before seeing them behaving on the battlefield. Their name and visual are hardly helping (especially for Nods units), and their summary is poorly written.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160519657', 'num_games_owned': 307, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1625032770}
review:
Скачал я как-то давно С&C TW и KW... Редко когда так сильно влюбляешься в игру... Глубокий сюжет, отличная динамика, графен для своих то годиков, оооооооо эта харизма и игра Джозефа Дэвида Кукана (Кейна), благодаря его игре я полюбил Братство НОД и верю в светлое будущее тиберия!... И тут я решил купить "Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight", сказать что полная хер, ничего не сказать. Как можно было одним релизом убить то что полюбилось игрокам за долгие годы, нет привычных механик и геймплея, за которым модно было сидеть часами... Эта мультяшная графика, а-ля мобильная игра... аж до тошноты. 
Если вы не хотите разочароваться в данной серии и не хотите вызвать рвотные позывы... даже не пытайтесь в нее поиграть.
Можете, конечно, но люди предупреждали... Те люди кто писали отзывы со слезами на глазах.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086566106', 'num_games_owned': 678, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1543671037}
review: Полное неуважение к фанатам серии. Не рекомендуются к покупке.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088367762', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1625719424}
review:
Contras:
-Te pide iniciar sesión 2 veces en EA, caso contrario no podrás jugar
-El serial puede no funcionarte y hasta podrías tener que instalar Origin para correrlo
-Ya no se arman bases, cosecha tiberio ni existen las bombas nucleares ni cañón de iones
-Ahora cada unidad tiene un tipo de arma y blindaje: si no dispones del arma adecuada para destruir a cierto blindaje, casi que no podrás destruirla (por ej. destruir Mammoths con lásers)
-Las unidades son gratis, se construyen rápido y son limitadas: ahora existe un sistema de puntos parecida a la comida en Warcraft III. Esto provoca que entres en un loop contra el rival donde cada unidad destruida instantáneamente es reemplazada
-Todo se hace desde un Crawler, una base móvil que cae del cielo (literal)
-La campaña tiene 7 misiones por facción y se terminan en 5 horas
-Los Scrin nunca volvieron a pisar la Tierra, a pesar de haber prometido una invasión total
-El hilo argumental no sigue para nada C&C3 ni KW, todo el ejército cyborg de Legión prácticamente no existe
-Su apartado gráfico es inferior a su precuela, con un tono ligeramente caricaturesco
-El diseño de los vehículos es demasiado genérico, casi que no existen unidades míticas de toda la saga más que el Mammoth tank, la nave Venom y la moto de ataque
-Al no haber base, la condición de victoria se reduce a capturar nodos de tiberio, algo así como construir maravillas en Age of Empires pero más aburrido todavía

Pros:

author: {'steamid': '76561199125810073', 'num_games_owned': 35, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1624611439}
review: cc4颠覆了cc系列的概念，改的不成功。感觉就是把贴图换一下，把原来建造项分成三个mcv完成，以此提高难度。和cc3相比也没加入什么新建筑和单位，就我自己来讲还是想看到新兵种和建筑、有更复杂的克制关系这些。说实话也不值这个价，仅仅和mod差不多。

author: {'steamid': '76561198070922490', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1624819426}
review: I cant tell which is  worse this or C&C mobile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011602178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1860, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1625738405}
review: Certainly not the best CnC game. U could say a "unique" system. However the grinding for exp to unlock the full army potential is just annoying. Campaign itself doesn't represent much. On the topside u could say there a few "old time units" coming back from games like tiberian dawn and CnC 3. But that's about it, also the unit limit is annoying, you could say it adds to the tactical element so the player needs to overthink what units to use. But not really fitting for those that know the franchise. It's a bit of a mixed feeling for me. I got it simply out of nostalgia after playing the other games in the series. Would say try it if you haven't played any other games in the franchise, otherwise you may get dissapointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007784853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1624817854}
review:
As a long time C&C fan who played all the others back to the original when it came out, I knew this was bad, but saw it on sale and wanted to "complete the collection".  This game feels like it was designed by executives in a conference room who never saw any C&C game.  They completely killed the playstyle and themes that made the franchise what it was. There is no base building in the sense of past C&C games, everything is done by your headquarters. And you have 3 types of HQ you switch between all that do completely different things.  To switch is not a button on the building to toggle. Oh no, they chose a much more logical option. You destroy it and call in a new HQ! Thought Tiberium was cool? There is no resource collection/management, you just stay under a low cap for units and defensive structures.  You'll see a bit of Tiberium on the map sometimes, take a screenshot for the memories. 

Oh yeah, and you need to have an EA account to play it. Even on sale, your cash is better spent by lighting it on fire. At least then you won't waste hours of your life you can never get back.

review: Игра, похоронившая тибериумную серию. Графика скопирована с Red Alert 3. Геймплей сводится к постройке МСЦ одного из трех классов (наступательного, оборонительного или класса поддержки). Появился лимит войск, от чего сражения перестали быть масштабными. Миссии в кампании однообразные. Есть ранговая система, и, по мере повышения уровня, игроку будут открываться новые юниты, что совсем не добавляет интереса к игре. Из плюсов можно отметить только большое разнообразие боевых единиц. В остальном игра оставляет желать лучшего.

author: {'steamid': '76561198395116476', 'num_games_owned': 517, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 767, 'last_played': 1608811888}
review:
[h1]自1995年的[b]“黎明”[/b]以来，CNC系列迎来了它最终的[b]“黄昏”[/b]。[/h1]
[h1]真可惜没有介于“推荐”与“不推荐”之间的选项，游戏并不是特别差，只可惜被经营到一个半死不活的状态。[/h1]
[b]《命令与征服4：泰伯利亚黄昏》[/b]可以说是对该系列进行了一次大胆创新的变革。突破了传统的RTS玩法，也打破了曾经的CNC的游戏模式。但是变革也必将伴随着痛苦与质疑，尤其是顶着[b]“《命令与征服》”[/b]这一沉重而辉煌的名号。
[h1]【“王八大战”的利与弊】[/h1]
巨大的变革都在于此。
没有了前系列作的扩张基地建筑群的满足感；也没有了在同等时间大量堆兵的碾压快感；更没有了建造超级单位和武器的激动心情……
取而代之的是3种不同功能的移动MCV；双方共同被限制的单位人口；以及地图上固定时段刷出的升级资源……
基于种种改变，游戏的玩法也发生了巨大的变化。在本作中则更注重于不同MCV的功能与机动[spoiler]（因为其灵活性差与体型庞大，被称为“王八”也不足为奇）[/spoiler]，并且玩家也需要在人口资源的限制之下决定在不同的时段应该怎样分配单位的生产与作战时的组合，再者就是该怎么利用手上现有的力量来完成升级资源的抢夺或者是达成任务目标等等目的。
由此可见，这一作更注重的是单位与功能的组合与资源分配，并且也大大提升了其网游化的程度，更推崇玩家之间的合作与对抗，尤其在团队对抗时，不同玩家选择不同的MCV也会有不同的分工与搭配，使得游戏性有了质的飞跃。
但是从反向来看，这样的改变也是带来了很多不利因素。头一个就是老派的CNC玩家可不一定认账，从内容上看则是有太多的简化，而且玩法上的差异也并不会让人立马适应而觉得玩起来会很舒服。而且地图的设计也变得更加死板，几乎是清一色的竞技向地图，大大减少初始站位的偶然性，使得其过度电竞化。最大诟病的因素之一就是糟糕的人口限制，虽说在一定程度上抑制了人海堆兵，但也减少了单位组合多样化的可能性，降低了战术尝试过程中带来的容错率。
总的来说，针对如果真的是找不来朋友，或者不能快速适应新模式的玩家来说，这一系列的改动则是失败的。
[h1]【旧碗装新饭】[/h1]
一个[b]“4”[/b]字[spoiler]（宣传视频甚至还给了特写）[/spoiler]可以说是正传的正统延续，但制作组却并没有因此去使用新的引擎，而是沿用了CNC3的老引擎来制作CNC4，所以不论是在界面操作，以及游戏内的操作都透漏着一种没什么进步的感觉，甚至会让玩家觉得这是用旧的东西改出来大型官方模组。一度还夹杂着赶工与减料的嫌疑。
[h1]【平淡却不得不叙说的故事】[/h1]
作为最终章来说，故事内容是合格的，最大的缺点就是短小急促。但因CNC3和《凯恩之怒》的素质就已经摆在那里，所以本作作为最终章能做到这个程度也是实属不易。演员的演技似乎只有凯恩和妻子在线，其他演员略微有些尬演，而GDI司令弄一个黑人大妈来扮演多少有点zzzq的味道，而且整体看来显得相当违和。拍摄布景虽然显得简略，但表演者的镜头感则是相当的不错，也算是对此有另一方面的弥补。
故事依然是GDI 和NOD之间的对抗，但随着全球环境的恶化，人们也不得不在不同的理念中做出抉择。而主角“指挥官”就是其中重要的一位。他曾解救GDI的上司与其一同起义来阻止敌人的野心；也曾为NOD铲除叛党替身凯恩实现升天大计。终于信徒们去往新的世界，而地球也结束了战乱的循环。
如果说伴随着长达15年的陪伴最终要以这一作来画上句号，那应该就是在升天传送门打开时，凯恩对玩家说的那句包含了诸多意义的：
[b]“谢谢你”[/b]。
[h1]不想完全压死这个游戏，只能说：[/h1]
[h1]好玩，但并不耐玩[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198035729456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1627277354}
review:
[b]You only buy this to play the story campaign & when it's discounted, more info below[/b]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW BEFORE PURCHASING[/b][/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700]──────────────────────[/url]
EA doubled down on DRM for this game. The first problem I encountered was logging in. When you buy this off Steam, you need to make sure you have an Origin account and register your new cd key on Origin. There are two logins in this game. When you start the game, you start the launcher first and it requires you to enter your Origin credentials. Now there’s another login screen in-game, you will enter the same credentials. HOWEVER, compared to the launcher’s login, if your password is MORE THAN 16 CHARACTERS the game will not log you in. The [b]in-game password field cannot go past 16 characters.[/b] I had to shorten my password, making my account less secure. Now, this game has another problem and it’s a major one.

It appears that the multiplayer features of the game are locked; the servers supporting the multiplayer must have shut down. Attempts to host a lobby will give you an error. [b]There’s no way to know if auto-matching works, but it’s safe to say that all three multiplayer features--lobby hosting, co-op campaign, and auto-matching--do no longer work.[/b]

The only features you have access in this game is the campaign and skirmish against computer AIs. And who knows when this game’s remaining servers, for logging users in, will shut down.

So, if you’re interested in only playing Command and Conquer 4’s story campaign, I recommend you buy it when it is heavily discounted. I got this for $5.


[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]PUBLISHER REVIEW[/b][/url] 👎
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700]─────────────[/url]
Electronic Arts double downed on DRM for this game, making it always online. Prior to this game’s release, the publisher killed some interesting projects for the franchise. They shutdown Tiberium, a squad-based shooter that takes place after Tiberium Wars that looks like Halo and is a spiritual successor to C&C Renegade. They shut down a sequel to Generals that had a story that sounded similar to Homefront games. Command & Conquer 4’s Tiberium Twilight started its life as an MMO which explains why there is a class and leveling system. The game was forced to be salvaged into a triple AAA rts game, retaining many gameplay mechanics that fans definitely would dislike. Furthermore, they forced the franchise's future games to be browser and mobile games. They killed Generals 2, which is trying to return to its RTS roots.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]DEVELOPER REVIEW[/b][/url] 👍
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700]─────────────[/url]
They tried their best salvaging this game when it started as an MMO and faced heavy pressure from Electronic Arts’s higher ups. There are some bugs, but the production quality is still good. These guys did their best and I wouldn’t fault them.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]ACCESSIBILITY & OTHER REVIEW[/b][/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700]─────────────[/url]
So I usually supersample the older games I play. Playing on 4k resolution in C&C4 in 1080p monitor is fine. The game looks a little better and sharper, but the cursor does not scale up. It's incredibly tiny, so it's hard to select buttons or icons.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]GAME REVIEW[/b][/url] 🤷‍♂️
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]AS A RTS GAME[/b][/url] 👍
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700][b]AS A COMMAND & CONQUER GAME[/b][/url] 👎
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TITLEplayer/recommended/47700]──────────[/url]
So this is a review of the current state of the game, meaning it will keep in mind that the multiplayer features are unavailable. Out of all the command and conquer games, this one has the worst story and campaigns. It is also very short. The GDI campaign is the worst one, and doesn't really explain the little details that's going on in the story. That's left to the NOD campaign, but is a bit better. Few of the Normal missions are hard to complete because your arsenal will be incomplete, your profile is under-leveled, and you can't play coop with another. You will have to play the campaign twice if you want to complete your arsenal. By then, it would be fun to play the campaign on the hardest difficulty with your full arsenal, but would it be worth the replay though?

This game reminds me of End of Nations and feels like a real slim down version of Red Alert 3. Even some of the unit designs feel as silly as the Red Alert 3's. Take, for example, the scorpion tank between C&C 3 Tiberium Wars and C&C4. In the previous game, it's sleek and looks like it's designed to be fast. In C&C4, it just looks more like a robotic scorpion. Or GDI's wolf tank looks like a little brother of the apocalypse tank.

The crawler system is interesting. You are given three types: offense, defense, and support. It makes the game almost feels like a moba and a beginnings of a MMORTS. Some units would have one or two abilities. Unit commands are carried over from Red Alert 3 and C&C3 Tiberium Wars and this game emphasizes a bit more on micromanagement. Although, I found the max population to be low and wished it was a tad higher. To upgrade, you have to level up your profile and right now, the fastest way is probably through the campaign. In the game, you will need to use your engineers to collect Tiberium crystals to be able to do upgrades (once you unlocked them through leveling). Furthermore, there are buildings that serve as control points which can be captured by your surrounding units. These grant further defense or extend deployment/building area. It feels similar to Dawn of War 2 or Company of Heroes, but worse. The defense crawler will be the closest thing to base building. Support crawler is focused a lot of building aerial units and using support abilities. I think the game shines a bit when you're playing 5 vs 5 with the AI, so you can have different crawlers supporting each other with their different unit compositions. Too bad multiplayer doesn't work anymore.

So as a C&C game, it's the worse but it's better than the recent mobile/browser C&C games. As a RTS game, it's okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086389393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 658, 'last_played': 1664822921}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197976755438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1616983163}
review:
Seul point fort: la qualité des cinématiques, et retrouver Kane.
Pour le reste, ça n'a RIEN A VOIR AVEC Command & Conquer. 
Pas de gestion de base, pas de gestion de ressources, et le nombre d'unité sur le terrain est limité à une petite dizaine. On ne dispose que d'un seul bâtiment orienté attaque, défense, ou soutien générant une gamme d'unités différentes. Du coup, impossible de les mixer pour adapter sa stratégie (dommage pour un RTS) comme par exemple des unités aériennes et de l'infanterie par ; Ou des tourelles (oui ça non plus) et des tanks... Absurde. 
Et ces limitations amènent au point négatif centrale selon moi, à savoir: les boucles de gameplay. 
Faire pencher la balance d'un côté ou de l'autre est devenu tellement fastidieux, que l'on se retrouve refaire cent fois les mêmes actions en espérant gagner un peu de terrain sans succès ... ... mais sans que l'adversaire ne parvienne non plus à nous battre ! Même avec les plus fortes unités! 
Tout est long, répétitif, et donc extrêment ENNUYEUX.
Et je ne parle pas de la difficulté à activer le jeu sur Steam à cause d'EA, ou encore de l'obligation d'être connecté pour jouer !
En bref, c'est un plantage totale de la part d'Electronic Arts pour un titre qui se voulait être le dernier d'une belle saga. 
ENORME déception, énorme gâchis.

review:
Where to start.... Well, I manged to get 2 missions in before giving up, and those were just the tutorial missions. It felt nothing like a C&C game. At all. And while it may say 12 or so hours played, that's because I fell asleep on the keyboard from trying to get it to work. I also had to contact EA on playing the game since my code didn't work. It took longer for me to get access to the game than I've actually played.

In conclusion, I paid $4 and still feel ripped off, although the laughter I get from this game is priceless.

Edit: My brain cells were so fried after playing this garbage that I made grammatical errors. Corrected.

author: {'steamid': '76561199003699575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 5796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1376, 'last_played': 1705724939}
review:
If you're looking to play this game as a sequel to the Command and Conquer Tiberium series, you shouldn't buy this game. It holds almost no connections to the original trilogy gameplay-wise and the overall plot isn't all that well supported. Now if you were looking to play this game without knowing what Command and Conquer is, then you might find some enjoyment in this game. It offers a sort of new concept of a moving base, and is very different from the base building RTS games that everyone is fond of. While the Unit Cap is quite annoying, it's understandable because for many people, commanding a limited amount of units while doing the same with the mobile base is easier than say, 200 units. 

There's a lot wrong with this game, one being that it was supposed to take the mantle of the Tiberium series, but failed catastrophically, and another being that there's many gameplay mechanics that are very dumb, like the unnecessary grind-y element of the game. Who would want to willingly grind out about 10 hours just to get the mastodon, or kodiak? They could have just restricted those unit access in the campaign, not in the Skirmishes. Or take the aformentioned unit cap; I said it was understandable, but that doesn't mean it was a very dumb thing to do. Most of the RTS players are perfectly fine with commanding a very large amount of units, that's the whole appeal of it.

With the story, I genuinely don't think it was alright. I will try not to spoil anything (though I doubt anyone would care even if I did,) but the way the campaign did the cutscenes, just no. I don't hate the actors that had to go through that, it's everything else about it; bland lines, decent-but-not-good enough emotion, the effects were alright, and definitely felt like it was made back in 2010. The story line did match up with the gameplay, but almost none of it made sense when you think about the other games in the franchise. There were plot holes like "how did GDI magically find a way to fight back against the Tiberium spread?" or "For what reason did Kane show the Tacitus to GDI?" that were never explained, even after pretty much a decade of radio silence. You should really not count this game as being canon to the story, sticking to C&C 3: Tiberium Wars is much better than this.

TL;DR, game not command and conquer, but decent RTS.

author: {'steamid': '76561199086494100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1613968063}
review:
不要买！千万不要买！根本玩不了！买了纯粹浪费钱！
操你妈EA，玩不了的游戏还卖你妈！
———————————————————————————————————
整了个盗版体验了一遍gdi战役，剧情很一般，两方的故事差不多，还有最后那个传送门看起来像是直接画在墙上的，太糊弄了。刷经验可以开PvE5v5我方4个残酷敌方两到三个残酷，尽量打就行，反正我们这边人多，就是经验有点少，打三盘才能升一级。打剧情倒是升级快，就是有点难，打不过就去打打PvE练练级。
游戏体验前期及其痛苦，级别高一些游戏体验就上来了，单位还挺好看，勉强玩玩打发时间也不是不行。最后说两句，steam上的别买，资源网上到处都是，玩不了下齐必备运行库，关了杀毒软件再试试，不然文件CNC4.dll可能被删掉。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040053868', 'num_games_owned': 575, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1667612781}
review:
I hate that it's so hard to get working, but it still works. Eleven years after the fact, if you register your game on EA's website, login twice and then run in admin mode on Windows, you too can play CnC4. That's all it takes.

For the game itself, it's ok. If it wasn't a legacy game, I'd say it's a solid 6.5/10. If you liked this game on release, something was wrong with you. But if you like the nostalgia, and the $4 price tag, it's a good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071823104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1633466711}
review:
Hat mit den vorhergehenden Teilen nichts mehr gemein. 
Die Aufbaustrategie, das Sammeln von Tiberium und sämtliche Themen die das spiel ausgemacht haben sind verschwunden.
Bauen von Basen ist nicht mehr möglich und die Ressourcen quasi nicht begrenzt. 
Lediglich die Mannschaftsstärke wird reguliert.
Als Fan der Reihe bin ich hochgradig enttäuscht, auch wenn hier neue Herausforderungen gestellt werden.

Sehr sehr schade, ich hoffe man kommt irgendwann auf das alte System zurück.

review: first you have to go to EAs website and enter the key there and not via the games interface. Which you only find out via the web forums rather than a redirect from the interface. Then i was unable to play (as I had go to my home screen to turn off my Spotify). At that point i couldn't; get back in to the game, close it on steam, close it on the task bar, or close it in task manager (all the while about 6 seconds of the games music was repeating). The only thing i was able to do was a forced restart. The new leveling system also very displeasing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982413081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 553, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1610632468}
review: This game is STILL plagued with issues regarding redeeming the CD key ...after you PURCHASE  the game! When trying to play the game thru steam you will get an error after trying to use your legit CD key and won't be able to play the game after entering the CD key. What isn't mentioned is you can still redeem the CD key on the Origin website if you get this error. I purchased this game years ago and never got to use that other CD key. Back then I had gotten no help from EA on the offical forums. I even had the original box and receipt for the game back then but didn't even get a response on official forums from EA games (was a different email etc for me). This is the last EA game I will purchase, no reason to buy games from a company that doesn't even bother to make minimal effort to insure you can play the game you paid for. They could have easily remedied the issue by including a link to the Origin website when launching the game advising to redeem the CD key there if you get an error message when trying to use your CD key after launching the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186133041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 4360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3825, 'last_played': 1615967095}
review:
+ Баланс, быстрое завершение матча, усиленный контроль за юнитами.
- Баги в огромном кол-ве, уровень от которого у тех кто не любит фарм сгорает жопа, старый дерьмовый движёк, сделанная на малом бюджете компания и игра в целом.
Вывод: Если вы готовы терпеть баги и старый движёк при котором юниты стоят как замороженные но при этом гордиться балансом то эта игра для вас.
Я бы поставил положительную оценку но даже за то что мне подарили эту игру я понятия не имею стоит ли это тех мучений что я получил из за выше перечисленных минусов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034646558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 672, 'last_played': 1609983190}
review:
This is not Command & Conquer.
You don't build bases, you don't farm Tiberium and spoiler, at the end;  Kain Lives. 
There's no Intel to give the story depth, the cut-scenes are parents-basement budget level and like ET, the Scrin have gone home. 

However; in place of base-building/resource farming mechanic, units are recruited through a mobile command centre that levels up as the game progresses. There's no limit to how many units you can field but you are limited to how many can be deployed at one time. 
The upside is; you are thrown into combat immediately and the intensity of the battle doesn't letup as you endlessly order more troops into the flesh grinder of combat. 

The objective based RTS is familiar and GDI/NOD maintain their traditional eagle/scorpion airborne/guerrilla antagonistic combat styles. You will lose a few games so its not a walk in the park.

I would give it 2/5. It's easy to play but loyalists will be woefully disappointed and there are better RTS' on the market. Play only if you want to see the series through.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044533822', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1702801102}
review:
[i]I thought I can't launch the game, after doing some steps I managed to launch the game with no issue[/i]

Good game, enjoyable and very good quality in 4K even the game was released 10 years ago, might be the worst game on Steam due to the game support on CD Keys, errors, and such (and EA).

Login twice wasn't an issue to me, the story is just kinda back to zero again if you did played CNC3, however I'am not. Game features of using one unit (crawler) to create units is very enjoyable (able to go mobile, escape, and such). There is co-op on the game, which gave more availability to do campaign a lot easier, or even skirmish together.

AI is just a bit drag to deal with on skirmish. On solo, Easy is actually Medium, FYI the AI on skirmish is actually 1-3 level higher than you (unfair was it?), I'm not even gonna try higher than Medium cuz I lack of hotkeys and multitasking (need lots of practice).

Had to disagree to the limited command points on both campaign and skirmish, I would prefer without it just like RA3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014516323', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1337238000}
review:
If this was a free to play game and had no connection to Command & Conquer, I may say give it ago... but it's not...

C&C4TT follows one of the best RTS series I've played. I would highly recommend playing any of the other C&C games in the series but this one. The reason this game got a overwhelmingly negative reviews is because (and I know this will be hard to believe) EA banged this out as a quick cash grab that ended up killing the franchise. You want the full story check youtube, many have covered this slap in the face.

If this game had no connection to C&C and free to play it would be okay at best. Unfortunately compared to it's predecessors its a turd...

author: {'steamid': '76561197964949013', 'num_games_owned': 741, 'num_reviews': 331, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1607988678}
review:
Thanks for Korean support!

# 꿀잼 3가지
1. 전혀 다른 게임 시스템: 기존의 전략 시뮬이랑은 많이 다른 새로운 시스템
2. 캐주얼한 게임 플레이: 거기다 친절히 유닛 상성까지도 보여주어서 좋음
3. 나쁘지 않은 그래픽: 2020년에도 꽤 봐줄만 한 그래픽

# 노잼 3가지
1. 자원이 없음: 자원이 없기 때문에 전략적인 면이 많이 없어지고 유닛이 별로 아깝지가 않다
2. 개성없는 유닛들: 기존의 C&C의 개성 넘치는 유닛이 없어지고 다 비슷비슷하게 보임
3. 유닛 생성 제한되어있는 게임 시스템: 전략 시뮬인데도 불구하고 레벨을 올려야지만 유닛을 뽑을 수 있는 이상한 시스템

# 총평
모바일 게임 C&C 라이벌의 토대가 된 듯한 시스템이 많이 보인다. 좋게 말하면 시대를 앞서간 게임이라 할 수 있겠다. 기존 C&C와 일반적인 전략 시뮬레이션이라고 생각하지 않고 플레이하길 추천

author: {'steamid': '76561197989144595', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 765, 'last_played': 1332831600}
review:
Bought this when it came out 10 years ago. It didn't take long for me to question all of the things they changed but I finished the game out of a sense of seeing the ending. If you're a big C&C fan I'd say it's worth 5 bucks just to experience how easy it was for them to both end and ruin an entire franchise at the same time.

I really just can't comprehend how this game made it out of testing. If they had ANYONE testing it who had played the previous games they would have been laughed at for wanting to make this. You know how base building, creating massive armies and everything else worked so well in the previous games? Yeah throw all of that out the window here. Your base is basically one building that does everything and you can only have a hand full of units at a time. This game is the perfect example of "Don't fix what isn't broken". Imagine if Blizzard released the next WoW expansion as a turn based browser game and this is how you end up with C&C 4.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096907219', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1546, 'last_played': 1683749884}
review:
Хоть игра вымерла, но я хочу вернуть в неё жизнь! Всё зависит от вас! Да, игра для фанатов этой франшизы вышло не особо хорошей. Но геймплей этой игры с 2010 года, он идеален. Игра показала себя с хорошей стороны и поиграть её с друзьями будет приятно и не забываемой.
К чему я всё виду? Есть дискорд канал куда я приглашаю всех вас мои друзья! Давайте вернём этой игре то времена.

Когда мы играли бок о бок и сражались за точки тибериума.

Когда мы кричали от побед и получения новых боевых единиц
.
Когда мы старались открыть первыми очки улучшения и прокачать свой краулер.


Добавляйтесь ко мне в друзья, и я добавлю вас в наш дискорд канал!

author: {'steamid': '76561198169186536', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1605267918}
review: Игра отвратительна! Постройки базы нет, юниты все однотипные и ты их не различишь когда они в одном месте скомканы. Графика упала на уровень по сравнению с предыдущей частью. Сюжет убогий на пол страницы поместится в 3-4 предложения. Вам дается выбор между двумя фракциями какую выберешь такая и концовка игры. Скринов из C&C 4 убрали в игре вы даже намека на них не увидите. Сражения скучные неинтересные! У вас 3 МСЦ на выбор и все они разбалансированные! Игра вне кампании отвратительна и выглядит вот как: садятся два жука и смотрят друга на друга кто-кого переспамит юнитами. Экономическую составляющую в игре полностью убрали вместо ресурсов у вас командные очки которые ограничивают вас в наборе юнитов. 10 юнитов всё - очков командования у вас нет поэтому идите нафиг и воюйте этими 10 юнитами! Сидишь задрачиваешь этот 1 отряд из 10 юнитов... За тиберий, который кстати надо еще до зоны высадки дотащить, используется в качестве улучшения ваших юнитов. На последних этапах игры когда вы всё прокачали тиберий вам больше не нужон и все что вы имеете в игре это ваш долбанный жук и ваш отряд с 10 юнитами. Игра что на высокой сложности что на низкой одинакова и собственно вопрос "а в чем прикол?" Типа у вас есть выбор, но от этого выбора у вас ничего не зависит. Кстати компания проходится за 3-5 часов, а их там 2. Чтобы разблокировать весь контент вы должны набрать кучу опыта на 1 фракцию по 15-20 часов дрочни одними и теми же юнитами. Итого игра с 2 фракциями у вас на 40 часов максимум дальше в игре делать нечего. Соревновательного интереса в игре как такового нет из-за вырезанной экономики все что вы можете это спамить юнитами. ВОТ ВСЯ ЭТА ИГРА ВОТ СВОДИТСЯ К ОДНОМУ ЛОГИЧНОМУ ВЫВОДУ - "ДРОЧНЯ ЮНИТАМИ" которых между прочим аж целых 10 штук. Пасьянс и то интереснее будет... Не тратьте время на нее

review: 4代的兵种，相对于3代其实是各有特色的，确切的说有可取之处，而且飞基地争夺地盘这种事在局部战争中也的确更为理想，地图太小，武器相对太大，导致限制了武器数量，我知道种种尝试都是以失败告终，反而最后被星际争霸2拿去充分利用了，仅仅因为星际争霸2还在用以往的打法，如果4代允许两种模式并存，相信评分仅次于凯恩之怒，而现在看来就远远不行了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198160175782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1603388435}
review:
就不说激活码还需要去EA那边去重新激活，做了十几次掷骰子的验证码，以及卡了无数次的注册账号失败。这款游戏从头至尾都没办法和3代相比。我自己是个做游戏美术的，对游戏的机甲设计还是略有要求，先不说游戏其他部分，光美术而言就糟糕透顶，唯一可以拿来说的可能只有当中的影片做的更好了，可能他们钱全放在真人演出上了吧。话题回到游戏的机甲和兵种设计部分，好端端的几个机械硬是塞了一大堆光条，整个兵种和一堆塑料玩具一样质感极差，三代的那种真实感完全没了，让人特别失望。NOD的兵种也是变成了神经病，硬是塞了一些哥特元素还是啥的，LOW的飞起，特别是某些空中单位，你确定不是小玩具么？？丑的简直可以。再说说UI部分也是土到飞起，特别是胜利和失败图标，这是哪儿门子五毛特效啊？？之前炫酷的3D旋转标志到底去哪里了？
游戏玩法部分也特别奇怪，变成了一个容易卡人口的刷兵游戏，一开始选择几种不同的基地多余的不行，从三代过来的表示完全一脸懵，基础运营和玩法完全变成了其他方向，玩起来特别变扭难受。

不想多说了，糟糕透顶！ 还是玩3代吧。。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561197968240625', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1080, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1080, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
Of all the command and conquer games available, this will be the black sheep that the rest of the series will never admit to being part of. 

This is the worst game of them all:
[list]
[*] Cannot build an army to overwhelm the enemy
[*] Unit choice is extremely limited
[*] No longer constructing Bases, its all movable unit creation
[*] Limited resources

They should have left it at C&C 3 or Red Alert 3. Spend your money on something else, even if its a 95% off sale DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026798802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1699105900}
review: En realidad no he podido jugar a este juego nunca. Las 3 horas que hay contabilizadas son las que he pasado con el launcher abierto tratando de hacerlo funcionar. No, en serio, EA es una empresa estafadora y comprar juegos de EA es arriesgarse a perder tu dinero a cambio de nada. Nunca, en todos los años en los que he peleado por conseguir una solución, ninguna de las personas de Electronic Arts se ha dignado ni siquiera a molestarse en hacer algo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036176076', 'num_games_owned': 975, 'num_reviews': 4352, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1602401866}
review:
Я поставил игре лайк только за историю. Однако минусов в игре много:
1. Строительство - то что я любил в этой серии - его нет. Я разочаровался в ЕА именно тогда, 10 лет назад.
2. Графика 3 части в разы лучше, чем в 4й. словно создателей сменили, расстреляли, обoccали и изнacиловали. Именно в таком порядке. А на их место поставили людей, которые занимались разработкой мобильных игр.
3. Система баланса - ненужная чушь. Раньше ты строил базу и мог балансировано распределять игру под свою тактику. а сейчас ты просто выбираешь одну из трех систем танка, и воюй всю игру. Благо сменить можно во время игры, но удручает перестройка.
4. Концовку оставили открытой, но я просто не представляю какую наркоманию можно приплести к сюжету. Для меня игра кончилась на третьей части.
5. Каждый раз, чтобы войти в игру, надо вводить логин и пароль к серверам ЕА. Это неправильно как по мне. Игра забывает меня каждый чертов раз.

review: This game is not as bad as people say it is. I have been playing command and conquer since it first came out in the early 90's. This game is not traditional to the series and is more comparable to Company of Hero's. You have levels and exp. You have commander classes and unit veterancy.  Making this game feel like a more recent  release than it is. You can have fun in this game just remember it's a little different than the others. With that said the story is not very good and leaves you on a cliffhanger but that's how they always have been.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059286918', 'num_games_owned': 1000, 'num_reviews': 983, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 614, 'last_played': 1601268000}
review:
УФФ,сложно говорить про снс4 но начнем мы с 2 вещей.
1)Как в это играть?
Да проблема большая у комьюнити просто запустить игру.Инструкция.
Покупаем игру-при первом запуске или ручками копируем ключ активации-заходим в свой аккаунт ориджина(ну или создаем новый если у вас нет)-добавляем на аккаунт игру-вставляем ключ-привязываем снс4 к акку ориджина-закрываем ориджин-запускаем снс4 через стим-вводим логин и пароль в лаунчере-создаем профиль нового игрока для снс4-заходим в игру-вводим логин и пароль еще раз-все можно играть без геммора и с ЖИВЫМ онлином.
2)Зачем? А потому что в 2020 с ртс на столько все хуе. что снс4 хорошая ртс.Да игра долбанный паралелепипед вопросов но.
-Играть то интересно
-Есть кооп кампания
-Живой на 2020 онлайн.
-Кампания интересна как в старые добрые времена с живыми актерами,сюжетными поворотами и тд и тп.
-Игра отказалась от стандартной механики снс-тоесть база с ресурсами и прочим.Чем взорвала не хило так жопу фанатам. БЛИАДЬ А ГДЕ ТИБЕРИУМ? где харвестеры?как тут какать?.Да соглашусь в корне менять механики для номерной части это плохо.НО .но,с новой механикой играть то интересно,игра то дарит новый опыт отличаемый от классического я строю электростанцию,я выхожу в казармы я строю ресурсник и параллельно пару солдат.Типичный дебют в ртс(стандартные действия для каждой партии) убираются сразу тут можно с розгона в карьер.Игра стала более динамичной не дающее игрокам сидеть в обороне.Интересная механика с профилями армии.Атака-Защита-Поддержка.Это все не обычно но интересно.Но это сыграло с игрой злую шутку,большинство комьюнити бомбануло,не разобралось и похоронило игру а вместе с ней и серию.Класс.
-Но кроме спорных моментов игра себе сама выстрелила пару раз в ногу.
1)Фракции,их всего две.В стратегии в 2010.Да разрабы после 2003 поняли что ртс на 2 фракции гивно и начали пилить на 3.Даже в 2 и 3 сс были забытые и скрины.А тут что?НОД ГДИ-нейтральная постройка с 3 типами юнитов забытых.ВСЕ.А где 3 фракция?Нельзя было сделать тех же скриннов или забытых сделать полноценной игровой фракцией?Или кого то новых?Например людей которых заипла грызня между гсб и нод и они создали свою фракцию под названием-как меня это все надоело пойду вломаю по роже всем кто воюет (я образно).А тут 2 фракции.Да юнитов много но 2 фракции?Але?В стар варс емпаир эт вор в аддоне 3 было.
2)Открытие юнитов за опыт.Ну тут гениально,я покупаю ртс а получаю открытие юнитов (способностей) как в ММО.Аху,я в шоке.Как бы ЕА ты кто такой *собака женского рода* чтоб это дело? Какого *полового органа* я должен юниты открывать в пвп\пве и кампании? У вас диллер есть .... Вы юниты в киосках покупаете?Вы во что играете? Вы что мудилы?Да при помощи не совсем честных методов можно открыть все юниты для всех 2 фракций часа за 4.НО ЗАЧЕМ? Я понимаю там выбивать достижения или шкурки...НО ЮНИТЫ В ПЛАТНОй ИГРЕ?????
Вердикт такой-дайте игре шанс,если вы раньше не смотрели самое время изза дефицита жанра ртс посмотреть на игру.
Это как стремная баба и бутылка водки,после бутылки водки стремная баба не такая уж стремная.А у нас 2020 и жан ртс.
В 2020 СнС 4 не такая уж плохая игра.

author: {'steamid': '76561199078567410', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1054, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1669206710}
review:
第一次是在16年GDI和Nod都打到了20级，如果不是找一下当时的回忆和这一次降价我是不会再花钱买的。以下是我的理由：
1.相较RA，将军和其他泰伯，游戏模式变化太大了，人口限制这一改动在我看来直接杀死这游戏，而且建筑，技能，部队分开来搞，本意吧，我猜是加强团队合作，降低操作难度，可实际上战斗节奏太快，5V5一打团人都找不到了。
2.游戏模式太单一，玩起来太累，还要升级解锁单位，20级前对面AI压你等级，肝死。
3.剧情这。。。太草率了
但不得不说，这个游戏在渲染，模型和BGM方面做的很良心（Nod的战斗音乐上头）
哎。。。CNC系列就这么烂尾说实话真的难受，期待将来RA2和CNC2重做（将军有生之年能见到重做吧）

author: {'steamid': '76561198003736127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 7917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 124, 'playtime_at_review': 7792, 'last_played': 1710429205}
review:
"Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight" is the worst C and C game I have ever played, because:
1) It has a mobile base that you have to keep moving.
2) You have to collect resources by driving a unit to the resource area and back again - but that function isn't automated (which is annoying).
3) The creation of units is limited.
4) You have to earn upgrade points to make your units stronger, but those points take too long to earn.
When I played, I found that the first lot of units are weak and junk.

You also have to defend points, manually collect resources, and keep these points under your control, and you have to choose defence (which gives you defensive structures and low level assault units) or a sky base (no defence, but flying units, low grade tanks and vehicles) or an "Assault" base (which has good tanks, but no sky units or defensive structures.

The only positive I can give is that the controls are not bad (although not great), and it is a nice looking game with good graphics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014808674', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1456, 'last_played': 1599201004}
review:
Мне очень сильно хотелось, чтобы это была настоящая часть серии, а не левый суррогат, который в последний момент решили немного подкрасить и попытаться выдать за чистую монету. Я несколько раз начинал в нее играть, и даже почти прошел. Я надеялся разглядеть в ней хоть какую-то ценность, подвергая сомнению всю критику. И у меня не получилось. Единственное, что в этой игре бесспорно круто – это главное меню. Я залипал в него каждый раз, когда запускал игру. Оно излучает обещания пафоса и эпичности, и когда ты видишь его в первый раз, то не повестись невозможно. Кажется, что вот оно – невероятное и долгожданное приключение в любимой вселенной. Но хуй там плавал, к сожалению.

Иронично, что большинство критики таки оказалось вкусовщиной. Однако в каждом случае я все равно приходил к выводу, что игра говно. Например, все говорят, что персонажи плохие и никто не запоминается, кроме Кейна, и что актерская игра плохая и сюжет тупой. Это только отчасти правда. Я не знаю, куда люди смотрели, но актерская игра в роликах очень хорошая. Они стараются, и это ясно видно. А вот сами роли – плохие.

Или, например, фанаты серии ругают мультяшность графики, хотя в ней нет вообще ничего плохого. Я бы даже сказал, что она крутая. И эффекты сделаны очень красиво. А вот дизайны юнитов – это пиздец. Большую часть игры на экране какие-то коробки либо на колесах, либо летающие, которые с первого взгляда очень непросто отличить друг от друга. При этом некоторые отдельные юниты выглядят очень классно. Например, мотоциклы, стелс танки и шагоходы. Но все это теряется на фоне заполоняющих коробов, особенно у ГДИ.

И сам геймплей тоже обругали, главным образом за то, что нельзя строить базу. По-моему, эта игра вышла слишком рано, а разработчики, в свою очередь, опередили время. И практически предсказали тренд компьютерных игр на десятилетие вперед. Но ни аудитория не была готова, ни сами разработчики не были готовы сделать это правильно. Мне кажется, что если бы она выходила сегодня, то с некоторыми поправками такая моба-стратегия могла бы и выстрелить. Я был бы более чем не против поиграть в такую игру сейчас, если бы ее сделали с прицелом на конкурента доты, лольца и прочих овервотчей.

P.S. Финальный ролик – ебаный пиздец. Просто ебаный стыд. Очень дешево и всрато одновременно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198417550992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1598984957}
review: Von allen C&C Spielen defintiv das schwächste. Haarsträubend abschreckender Login-Prozess, die Gegner KI ist ein Witz, die eigene KI auch (ein Baum ist ein undurchdringbares Hindernis) und das schlimmste ist das neue System mit "Kommandopunkten" statt Tiberium-Abbau. Ich mein - C&C war Tiberium-Abbau und daraus Basen bauen. Aber dieses System ist wirklich völlig freudlos. Dafür gibt's extraviele extraschlimme Real-Video-Sequenzen mit Kane, der leider immer noch nicht schauspielern kann. Die coolen Nicht-Real-Videos haben sie dafür fast komplett weggelassen. Was für ein Schrottspiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129202356', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 703, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1414773839}
review:
I played this with a friend ages ago for the campaign and brief multiplayer match; am an avid fan of C&C having grew up with it.

It's not the worst C&C game to date, or even when it came out sadly as EA are clueless idiots; any and all lite or mobile versions are blatantly worse if by a small degree.

They removed the core gameplay in favour of an untested premise that proved largely inferior and alienated the fans and vets (the only people who would play) and gave a pretty lacklustre rushed story.

Lots of the game feels out of balance and overhauled units and other things unnecessarily. C&C 3 did exist and had gotten very close to a great system, yet they threw out all of that to try something completely different?

I'd say this was the game that killed the franchise but in truth, EA's meddling and incompetence killed the franchise.
It's quite worth playing the older titles, though I wouldn't be surprised to find very little for online play left.

review: As someone who grew up playing the many variations of this beautiful game franchise from the originals, red alert; generals; and the Tiberium sagas; even years after i purchased this horrid abomination of a game I still cannot bring myself to play it. This crap is not how the game series should have been sent off, this crap should never have seen its first downloads and unfortunate purchases. The developers I would hope didn't think this would be received well and did this under the age old my way or the highway petty bullshit that plagues the world of creativity when money is involved at any realistic level. If you've found yourself intrigued by this series, if you have any love for what you have come to enjoy out of this amazing strategy series DO NOT by this garbage please I wanted it to do well when it released I wanted to believe I was wrong for this thought process, but if over 2k people have had the same thoughts as i have that this game should be pulled erased and forgotten and our money and time reimbursed because of its sheer garbage nature then i can live with my favorite series ending in a damned dumpster fire so long as someone else can be spared my irritation. Edit: EA removed this dumpster fire and made it harder to get to hide the shame of this garbage game. F U C K. E A.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355557166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1596463767}
review:
Ho comprato questo gioco nonostante gli avvertimenti di coloro che ci hanno giocato, pensavo "Eh voglio provarlo con i miei occhi, vediamo se é davvero così brutto come dicono"...
...sono stato avvertito. 
Hai solo 50 punti comando, che anche se sembrano tanti in realtà ti permettono di avere sì e no 8 unità. Il gameplay é a dir poco noioso e... ci sta un sistema di level up dell'account per sbloccare tutto ciò che puoi costruire in una partita, nonostante nella campagna single player arrivi a combattere i mech di tier 3 nonostante stai ancora con i soldatini di livello 1. Sconsigliatissimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041447694', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1595720759}
review:
I loved C&C 3, both games.  But C&C4 went in the complete wrong direction.  The game mechanics are overly complex and just not fun and the online emphasis is a drawback, not an enhancement.  They got everything right in C&C3.  In fact, I would still be willing to pay money for an authorized C&C3 DLC with a full blown GDI or Scrin campaign, similar to what they did with Kane's Wrath.  Use the same game mechanics but clean up the engine and graphics.

For anyone who loves C&C3, stay far, far away from C&C4.

author: {'steamid': '76561198975250137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 46347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16650, 'last_played': 1672734792}
review: 怎么说呢，从小玩CNC系列玩到大，2018年入的正，一直玩到现在。音乐绝对好评，代入感很强，一听打起来就十分带劲。剧情的话其实还算好，烂尾就烂尾吧。游戏模式方面有点MOBA游戏的内味了，以前和朋友玩的时候甚至还要严格分工什么的【笑】。虽说人口限制确实是一个硬伤，但是呢你如果能凭借少得可怜的人口数去征服战场，那也不失为一种独特的乐趣。这个游戏里面多人合作远远比单人游戏拥有的快乐更多，想一想各种坑队友什么的，就算是被骂也觉得没什么。毕竟在团队合作里面才会体会到真正的友情。升级什么的慢慢来就可以了。这种5V5的竞技模式真的很让人着迷，天天想着不同的打法不同的阵容。最希望的是哪一天可以自由组队【不受阵营限制的自由组队】就好了。总而言之，这款别具风格的RTS游戏，很有潜力。具体怎么发展还是要看EA了，总之，这款游戏我给绝对好评。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991878132', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 745, 'last_played': 1563830279}
review:
I'm not sure what almost ruined this more for me; the wave of negative reviews by angry 30 year old teenagers taking out their frustration on software after their partners / parents crapped on them for peeing on the toilet seat and not cleaning up afterwords or leaving dirty laundry on the floor? Or perhaps the C&C fanboy/girl base who expected Tiberium Wars 3.5 but got something different, so threw the toys out of the cot? I'd say the former, who appear to be in the majority, as the latter have the intelligence to channel their anger and hatred towards the big bad nasty evil multinational conglomerate cabal - EA for short. Fair game to them, their opinion is almost relevant, but still...

For perspective: after coming back to Tiberium Wars and Kane's Wrath time and time again (it's aged beautifully, hasn't it?), I finally decided to try this out as I wanted a bit more story, however I was fully aware of the negative reviews over the years. Finally I got my chance as I had just finished it's predecessor for like the 5th time when this one appeared on special for literally pennies, so I thought "why not?"

I found myself fighting the feeling that the lynch mob were right, at least during the first few missions. But once I had numbed myself to the fact that the story was indeed passable, the acting (or overacting, in some cases) was lacklustre (excluding Joe Kucan, of course) I went with it and in the end found myself playing the game for what it was. And it was actually okay.

The formula is completely different and forces you to be more resourceful. Resource harvesting is gone and bases are essentially mobile. The graphics, lighting etc, remind me of Tiberium Wars, thus feel familiar which is okay. Units are over the top, but some structures remind me of it's predecessor. 

In a nutshell - I'm kind of glad I played/finished this game and got to scratch it off my list. At no point did I feel the need to rush through and each night I couldn't wait to continue playing.

Did I get my money's worth? Definitely
Did EA ruin the franchise by trying to reinvent the wheel? 110% Yes
Would i have preferred "Tiberium Wars 3.5" instead of this? Absolutely
Was it a memorable experience? Not entirely
Was it as bad as people say? Definitely not

If you can pick it up for couple of £ one day and are curious, I'd recommend it. You wouldn't have lost much. Sadly, some of the keyboard warrior reviewers here have turned this game (among others) into a public toilet where they can dump their hatred and anger, wash their hands and move on to Dota 2, CS:GO and Fortnite (games with communities that aren't toxic at all ;P). 

Whatever. Just be sure to pick through the intelligent, logical reviews before deciding. My verdict? It's not THAT bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061744143', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1594468504}

No se crean bases, no hay recolección de recursos, las unidades se hacen en la base con piernas y hay un limite muy pequeño de ellas para tener. Total, un sinsentido. En fin

author: {'steamid': '76561198105218626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1560383736}
review:
É bem zuado kkk!
Valor: Só em promoção
Gráficos: Bacaninha, mas nada espetacular
Bugs: Vai bem até, nada preocupante
Unidades: Tem umas bacanas, como aviões de cura bem grandes, mas nada incrível
Jogabilidade: Mudou muito da série:
- Agora temos 3 tipos de bases, e elas definem o tipo de unidade que podemos construir, e não tem tanto aquele conceito mais de cravar no chão e defender
- As unidades parecem carro de palhaço, nunca para de sair mais da base. Tem lá um cap que limita o total, mas não tem aquela restrição de quanto melhor minera recursos melhor teu exército... ficou bem mais superficial.
Progressão: isso ficou bom pelo menos, vai ganhando experiência e assim mais algumas unidades novas, mas não tem uma árvore para escolher, é meio tosco, linear mesmo.

Final: Se é fã da série, siga a série pq esse tá bem fora do esperado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198425980506', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1929, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 929, 'last_played': 1676808544}
review:
想来想去还是给了差评。
说实话这是CNC系列游戏体验最差的一款了，EA的创新不仅没有给CNC带来新生反而给CNC的棺材钉上了最后一颗钉子。
说这款一无是处的话是十分不公平的。单位设计与模型很棒；进攻、防御、支援的设计也还可以；如果抛去及其垃圾的剧情和CNC续作的滤镜来看的话至少是一款勉强及格的游戏。以上就是所有我能挑出来的优点了。
至于该游戏的缺点，包括但不限于过少的人口，体验极差的遭遇战，不知道是谁脑袋一热想出来的升级解锁单位，这都给这个游戏带来了极差的游戏体验，再加上食屎级的剧情，造就了CNC历史上最差的作品。
及其不推荐购买，即使是抱着试一试的心态也不要买，你会后悔的

review:
A more damning testament of EA's utter contempt for quality, fun, and everyone who is not an EA shareholder does not exist.
If you liked the C&C franchise, this game is like being tied to a chair and forced to watch someone burn all your family photo albums, one picture at a time. 

Do. Not. Buy. Not even if money means nothing to you, do not line EA's pockets further by paying for this sacrilege.

review: Es ist schade was sie aus der Command and Conquer reihe gemacht haben . Ein Epischer Abschluss der Saga mit so ein drecks Game. Crowler wer ist den bitte auf so eine blöde Idee gekommen damals ??? Und dann kommste aufgrund der Eingeschrenktheit in jeder Mission ab der seiten wahl in Strugeln. 48 einheiten limit ??? wer hat den scheiß erfunden ???     48iger einheiten limit heißt 6 einheiten gegen gegner der 2 crowlers hat und du bist alleine. WTF kauft diese Game bloss nicht selbst als Fan der reihe ist 4 der größte Bockmist den sie geschossen haben man macht mich das sauer. Hoffe es gibt ein Remaster von 4 WO MAN CROWLER IN DEN MÜLL WIRFT. Und wieder auf Basenbau geht. wie es in 3 Teilen so war und auch GUT war.  Meine Warnung an euch wer Unnützes geballer ohne verstand will was den Look von C&C tiberium reihe haben will,kauft es,  wer auf basenbau hofft mit tiberium sammeln lasst die finger davon.  ps : rechtschreibfehler könnt ihr behalten wenn ihr welche findet danke.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970635665', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 792, 'last_played': 1327392000}
review:
I actually like the concept of this game. They made a big mistake putting "4" in the title because you assume it will be like 1-3 but it's not. I did actually enjoy the game play though. 

Back when you could play online my biggest problem honestly was the you didn't get to pick which faction to play half the time because it had to have equal numbers of GDI and Nod players. Don't know why it matters. In every other C&C game you could skirmish with whatever teams you want. 

Not played for years but based on the other reviews you can't even play online now so for that reason I'm going to to choose not recommended.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198133872739', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1516243539}
review: This game is such a massive piece of shit, they took literally everything that was the heart and soul of CNC and turned it into some shitty rock, paper, scissors game. there is so much game design that just doesnt make any sense, whether its the 3 distinct "mobile bases" for each faction, that can only build a third of your unit roster. or maybe the units cards that "level up" the more you use them, leading to an extremely unbalanced multiplayer, or the nonsensical storyline.... everything about this game just feels like a cash grab, it feels rushed, it feels like the development team had so many ideas and orders pulling them in different directions that the end product suffered so badly its absolutely unplayable.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983703249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 706, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 706, 'last_played': 1321430400}
review:
What a disappointment this was.  This is one of the first games I played where I learned that EA had become (and still is) the great destroyer of game franchises...

Syndicate (Bullfrog)
Command & Conquer (Westwood)
Mythic Entertainment
PopCap Games
Bioware
... etc...etc...

review: Total Flop the whole game mechanics have changed, unit build restrictions small world maps  no bases to defend just a single unit (MCV) totally confusing user interface so in my opinion its a waste of money and extremely disappointing also states i spent over 4 hours playing  which in fact was me actually stuck at the load screen trying to register the serial number so a refund was refused my actual play time was less than 20 mins.

review:
A mediocre game that takes an approach completely at odds with all other games in the C&C franchise. If this wasn't branded with "Command & Conquer" you'd have no idea that it was meant to be part of the series at all, due to the fall in quality, the completely different gameplay style and the lack of an enjoyable experience.

Save your money for a real C&C game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050737934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1590083748}
review:
I got this with the C&C pack. I am very happy that I did not waste any extra money on this. I am a casual player or C&C from the first game also Red Alert from the first one. This is not a C&C RTS game, just garbage.

First you need to login to EA servers to play all the time which is absolute madness. After creating user or re-using your origin username, you cannot activate it from steam, it gives error. Workaround is to copy key to origin add it there then you can continue at steam. What a pile crap.

The mobile base seems to  be a change to make this game something else but it locks you on "command point" b-shit, it is not a fun game. Do not waste your precious time with this garbage.

review:
Казуальная механика кроулеров убила геймплей. Даже плохая игра актеров в катсценах не является более милой деталью проработанной игры. Скорее вишенкой на торте из разбитых надежд. Воистину, это черная страница истории серии C&C. Не рекомендую. 


Зато перед запуском надо было три раза ввести пароль от Origin, который местами не сохраняется, через Steam её активировать невозможно. Мне как бы говорили: не лезь туда, там плохо! Но я полез. 0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198205986924', 'num_games_owned': 98, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 1330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1027, 'last_played': 1621257907}
review:
Минусы: 1. Сюжет слабый, особенно концовка (да, их там несколько, но по факту, одна и та же). Персонажи убогие. Даже Кейна подпортили, как по мне. Хотя Джо Кукан всё еще играет отлично. Никогда не забуду Кейна предыдущих частей. 2. Игра не стоит своих денег. Я за Red Alert 3 готов отдать 999 рублей, а вот за такую короткую, да и можно сказать, сделанную на коленке игру, 1к это перебор. 3. Мертвый мультиплеер (то-ли из-за серверов, то-ли из-за мертвого онлайна, хз). 4. Обесценивание юнитов и построек. Раньше, вы ценили юниты и постройки из-за того, что вы на них тратили большое количество денег. Это очень сказывалось на динамике игры в положительную сторону. Сейчас же это убрали. Вам вообще будет наплевать на юнитов. Потеряли - сделали новых. Это полностью уничтожает разнообразие и динамику. Зачем это сделали? Непонятно. (5). Перевод. Перевод убогий. Например: кому, наxеp, пришла в голову идея о переименовании ГСБ в ГДИ?????. Для тех, кто не в теме, поясню: GDI это Global Defense Initiative, что можно перевести как Глобальный Совет Безопасности. А ГДИ это что? Я даже предполагать не буду. Озвучка посредственная, видно что вообще не старались.  Просто позвали самых заезженных актеров на озвучку, которые просто читают текст. Только Кейн и Жена ГГ озвучены нормально. 6. Защита от взлома. Наличие DRM, постоянное подключение к интернету и необходимость иметь аккаунт EA. (7). Музыка. Не знаю почему, но мне вообще не зашло. Какие-то звездные войны, а не C&C.
() - субъективный или относящийся к определенной версии игры

Плюсы:
Их нет, к сожалению

author: {'steamid': '76561198075109545', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1586777775}
review:
和 三 代 完 全 不 一 样 
人口上限和画风软化我都能接受，隔壁星际一样有人口上限，人家依然有很好的体验；红警3画风比这个更Q，但我也表示很喜欢。结果EA直接度改成成了英雄连4，RTS 的基础结构直接给整没了，EASB这么NB你咋不去收购水雷？
差劲的寻路和碰撞体积还是没改，一个小兵穿过队伍，其他单位直接抱头鼠窜，同年出的星际2和这个形成了鲜明对比。
剧情突然神秘，开始朝着无脑洗白nod去了，三带留下来的谜团吗没几个解开的。
ps根据大佬说这个四代就是EA赶鸭子上架，把外传作品命令与征服：竞技场包装成了续作卖，所以好好地RTS直接成了王八大战，EASB完事

author: {'steamid': '76561197971037696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3765, 'last_played': 1423195537}
review:
This wasn't just a case of trying something aggressive and risky and having it fail in flames. This was abject disregard and disrespect for the consumer base. 

The best thing I can say about this game is that when it came out we thought EA had hit a low point. We were so naive. The rabbit hole turned into an inter-dimensional wormhole. 

If you're considering paying money for this atrocity in some 2020 COVID-19 sale, chances are it's not your money.

BE VERY WARNED!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006584783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1585071056}
review:
Command and Conquer 4 was a bad game when it first came out and it's still a bad game after all these years.

A little backstory behind the game, this was going to be a standalone game set in its own universe that's completely separate from the Command and Conquer universe. Early on during the project, the brilliant executives at EA thought they would make more money from the game if they slapped the Command and Conquer logo on it and based it within the Tiberian universe. So the devs were pretty much forced to turn a game that was never intended to be a Command and Conquer game into Command and Conquer 4. 

The result? An absolute mess. Plays nothing like any of the Command and Conquer games. There's really no economy or base building, it's just mindless unit spamming until you win. I completed the GDI and Nod campaigns and then immediately uninstalled -- never to play again. The story is terrible, by the way.

review:
Playing Command & Conquer 4 makes me wonder why they didn't make Command & Conquer 4. 
This is not a Command & Conquer game.
This is a capture the flag game with tanks.
Is it possible that the people who made this had even played the previous games?
If it weren't for GDI and Nod themed cutscenes, it would be completely unrecognizable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106040515', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1405028371}
review:
Personally this has ruined the the franchise. Command and Conquer in name only. Personally its been some time since I played it. I lasted maybe the first 3 levels, quit game, without saving, then completely uninstalled it. Though unfortunately it still shows in my library and I regret it to this day for the money I threw away  for a game I waited so long for. And with the addition of an, apologies,   bullshit and totally unwanted/unnecessary mobile game, it seems to me CnC will turn into a pathetic money grab And as a fan for over 20 years, I'm not only disappointed but sickened by the pathetic attempt this game was to rekindle the franchise while totally ruining what could have been a fantastic addition. Alas, my fellow fans to the series. Perhaps in time, Kane shall rise again, and we get the Epic RPG we deserve with today's technology. Until then, 

ONE VISION, ONE PURPOSE. 
My brothers and sister.

review:
I've played this game twice, once alone and once with a squad of friends and enjoyed both
-Big open world with tons of weapons and different types of compounds and military bases that you can plan and approach as you see fit.
-Story is not that fresh but decent
-Sync shot is probably my favorite feature in this game.
-Overall enjoyable

author: {'steamid': '76561198151706193', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1426473089}
review:
This game is not ike the others. I grew up playing CNC, Starting with Generals and Zero Hour. eventually going back to play the 2D CNC Games. They all have the same basic way to play, Build a base, Defend and push. 

CNC 4 is more a Class Rush Strategy then a Real RTS. There is no base building. You drop the MCV build units from it and then send those units and the MCV to attack. thats it

Sure you can argue that you gotta finish the Kane Arch. No. watch someone else suffer through it or look up lore. cause playing it for the story is not worth it.

Go back, Play CNC 3 TB and KW. Heck even go play Generals or RA2 on ORIGIN. But do not BUY THIS GAME

author: {'steamid': '76561198011402258', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1492700791}

author: {'steamid': '76561198186945879', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1580991958}
review:
首先，我是一个命令与征服老玩家（这系列游戏算是从小打到大了），要我用几个字表达我对这游戏的看法？只有一个字————呸。真如其名《命令与征服4:泰伯利亚的黄昏》我觉着可以把“4"和”泰伯利亚“去掉改成《命令与征服：黄昏》请各位C&C粉丝们别买这个游戏，就算一定为了信仰买，也要等促销时再去买。我承认这游戏BGM不错，但是游戏太TM烂了。
1.人口：众所周知，暴雪的星际和魔兽两大神作在当时是和红色警戒（命令与征服）在一个层面的，而让红色警戒别具一格的地方之一便是无人口限制，你想体验苏维埃的钢铁洪流？或者说是人民的力量？都没问题。EA把这个改没了我不懂是什么操作。
2.剧情：完全扯犊子，凯恩怎么就突然升天？NOD就没了！？剧情与前作什么鬼衔接啊。
3.游戏内：C&C3代的AI问题，寻路问题，依旧没有修复，许多BUG依然没修复。
原谅我爆了些粗口，如果非要我说这游戏有什么值得赞扬的地方？那也就只有BGM和CG值得称赞了吧。感谢EA仍然坚持制作真人CG。

review: Все отрицательные отзывы писал только те, кому нужно старое в новой обертке, олдфаги, маразматики и прочий мусор хорошо обосрали нормальную RTS чисто из-за того, что сделали не так, как надо, а по-своему. В прошлые части не играл,. поэтому игра понравилась, может быть в сравнении с прошлыми она и говно, но сама по себе она хороша, с другом и играем и норм. Если искали игру, где можно с другом поиграть и особо не запариваться, то вот хороший вариант
